personal.name: Cedric Tan
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer | AI/ML Specialist
personal.summary: Results-driven software engineer with 6+ years of experience in building scalable AI-powered applications and digital twin systems. Specialized in RAG architectures, vector databases, and cloud-native solutions.
personal.elevator_pitch: I build intelligent systems that bridge the gap between AI and real-world applications. With expertise in digital twins and RAG architectures, I help organizations leverage their data to create powerful, context-aware applications. My experience spans the full development lifecycle, from concept to production deployment.

salary_location.salary_expectations: $140,000 - $160,000 AUD based on role and responsibilities
salary_location.remote_experience: 4+ years in distributed teams across multiple timezones
salary_location.travel_availability: Available for domestic/international travel up to 20%

experience.title: Senior AI Engineer
experience.company_context: AI startup specializing in enterprise digital twin solutions, 150+ employees, Series B funded
experience.team_structure: Lead engineer of 8-person AI/ML team, 3 direct reports

achievements_star.situation: Client needed real-time digital twin for predictive maintenance with 99.9% uptime
achievements_star.task: Design and implement scalable digital twin architecture
achievements_star.action: Architected a distributed system using Python, FastAPI, and Upstash Vector, implementing RAG for real-time data processing
achievements_star.result: Reduced system downtime by 65%, saving $2.3M annually in maintenance costs, and enabling predictive maintenance with 92% accuracy

leadership_examples: Mentored 3 junior engineers to senior level
Established CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%

experience.title: Software Engineer

achievements_star.result: Improved API response times by 85%, reduced infrastructure costs by 40%, and enabled horizontal scaling

leadership_examples: Led migration from monolith to microservices

certifications: Google Cloud Professional Machine Learning Engineer (2022)
